729102f-a.title: Richmond: Malory Avenue - Hylan Boulevard
729102f-a.text:
Malory Avenue, south from Hylan Boulevard. The thoroughfare is
being cut through as part of Boulevard Heights real estate development.
May 20, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729102f-a.folder: Malory Avenue & Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
